ARABIC: وَنَادَوْا۟ يَٰمَٰلِكُ لِيَقْضِ عَلَيْنَا رَبُّكَ قَالَ إِنَّكُم مَّٰكِثُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will call out, 'Malik, let your Lord put an end to us!' He will say, 'You will stay the way you are.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will call (to the keeper of Hell-gate): "O Malik, let your Lord decide our fate." He will answer: "You are to stay."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They shall call out: “O Malik, let your Lord put an end to us.” He will reply: “You must stay on in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The angelic guard will say, "You will have to stay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they will cry out, “O Malik*, ask your Lord to finish us!” He will answer, “Rather you are to stay (forever).” (*The guard of hell)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they will cry: "O Malik (keeper of Hell)! Let your Lord make an end of us." He will say: "Verily, you shall abide forever."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they shall call out: O Malik! let your Lord make an end of us. He shall say: Surely you shall tarry.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they cry: O master! Let thy Lord make an end of us. He saith: Lo! here ye must remain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will cry, "Master, if only your Lord would put an end to us!" But he [the angel] will answer, "No! You are here to stay."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And -they will cry: O keeper let thy Lord make an end of us. He will say: verily ye shall bide
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will call out, ‘O Malik! Let your Lord finish us off!’ He will say, ‘Indeed you will stay on.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will cry: "O Malik! would that thy Lord put an end to us!" He will say, "Nay, but ye shall abide!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they will cry: "O Malik (Keeper of Hell)! Let your Lord make an end of us." He will say: "Verily you shall abide forever."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O Malik' (the angel of Hell) they will call out, 'let your Lord put an end to us' But he will answer: 'Here you shall stay'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they will cry, “O Malek, let your Lord finish us off.” He will say, “You are staying.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they will call, "O Malik, let your Lord put an end to us!" He will say, "Indeed, you will remain."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:77] And they will call out, ‘O Mālik — the [name of the] Keeper of the Fire — let your Lord finish us off!’, let Him make us die. He will say, after [the passing of] a thousand years, ‘You will surely remain!’, you will remain in the chastisement forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they cry: master) when their patience run out, they cry: master of the Fire! (Let thy Lord make an end of us). The custodian of the Fire answers them after 40 years, (He saith: Lo! here ye must remain) you will dwell eternally in the torment and you will never come out.
